params._priceFeeds: The ordered price feeds corresponding to the list of _derivatives

params._derivative: The derivative for which to get the rates

returns.underlyingAmounts_: The rates for the _derivative to the underlyings_

getOwner().details: Ownership is deferred to the owner of the FundDeployer contract

isSupportedAsset(address).details: This should be as low-cost and simple as possible

returns.isSupported_: True if the asset is a supported derivative

params._priceFeeds: The ordered price feeds corresponding to the list of _derivatives

addDerivatives(address[],address[]).notice: Adds a list of derivatives with the given price feed values

calcUnderlyingValues(address,uint256).notice: Gets the rates for 1 unit of the derivative to its underlying assets

getOwner().notice: Gets the owner of this contract

getPriceFeedForDerivative(address).notice: Gets the registered price feed for a given derivative

isSupportedAsset(address).notice: Checks whether an asset is a supported derivative

updateDerivatives(address[],address[]).notice: Updates a list of derivatives with the given price feed values

userdoc.notice: Aggregates multiple derivative price feeds (e.g., Compound, Chai) and dispatches rate requests to the appropriate feed
